author: captainnano
title: NANO Frames - Digital CNFT Frames
description: CNFT holders are looking for a way to display and interact with their NFTs on physical displays with Cardano wallet integration.
solution: NANO Frames are wallet-agnostic digital picture frames that display NFTs in the user's Cardano wallet seamlessly via the NANO App.
experience: A team consisting of 3 full-stack engineers with Plutus Pioneer 2 plus one serial entrepreneur taking care of the business side of things.
